"""
Corporate group requests bar space for networking event; coordinate private area and professional service.

ROLES: user (corporate event planner), assistant (corporate events manager for bar facility coordination)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "check_private_bar_availability",
    "description": "Check availability of private bar areas for corporate events.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "event_date": { "type": "string" },
        "guest_count": { "type": "integer", "minimum": 10, "maximum": 200 },
        "duration": { "type": "string", "enum": ["2_hours", "4_hours", "full_evening"] },
        "setup_type": { "type": "string", "enum": ["cocktail_reception", "seated_dinner", "networking_stations"] }
      },
      "required": ["event_date", "guest_count", "setup_type"]
    },
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "book_corporate_event",
    "description": "Book private bar area with professional service and catering coordination.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "event_name": { "type": "string" },
        "bar_area": { "type": "string" },
        "service_level": { "type": "string", "enum": ["standard", "premium", "executive"] },
        "catering_style": { "type": "string", "enum": ["passed_hors_doeuvres", "stationed_displays", "full_dinner"] },
        "av_requirements": { "type": "boolean" }
      },
      "required": ["event_name", "bar_area", "service_level"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
Capital Business Tower (hotel_id: cbt_dc_02)
Address: 1001 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20004
Timezone: America/New_York

Corporate Bar Facilities:
- Executive Lounge Bar: Private 120-person capacity with panoramic Capitol views
- Networking Stations: Modular setup accommodating 50-200 guests with flexible configurations
- Professional Service: White-glove attendants trained in diplomatic protocol and corporate etiquette
- Technology Integration: Built-in AV systems, wireless presentation capabilities, live streaming options
- Catering Partnerships: Collaboration with Wolfgang Puck and Jose Andres restaurants

Political & Business Hub:
- Established 1962 as Washington's premier business hospitality venue for government and corporate leaders
- Guest registry includes senators, Supreme Court justices, Fortune 500 CEOs, international ambassadors
- Secure meeting facilities with SCIF-level confidentiality for sensitive business discussions
- Proximity to White House (4 blocks), Capitol Building (6 blocks), Supreme Court (8 blocks)
- Diplomatic immunity protocols for international business delegations and treaty negotiations

Professional Event Services:
- Dedicated corporate concierge team with security clearances for government-related events
- Simultaneous interpretation services available in 15 languages for international business meetings
- Professional photography and videography with live editing capabilities for immediate content delivery
- Document preparation services including binding, translation, and secure courier delivery
- Executive transportation coordination including armored vehicles and helicopter transfers

Culinary Excellence:
- Executive Chef Patricia Williams formerly served as White House executive pastry chef
- Menu development considers dietary restrictions common among international delegations
- Kosher and halal certified kitchens for religious observance requirements
- Wine selection emphasizes American vintages to showcase domestic quality to international guests
- Late-night service accommodates time zone differences for international business travelers

Security & Privacy:
- Former Secret Service agents provide executive protection consulting
- Electronic surveillance countermeasures available for highly sensitive corporate meetings
- Secure communication systems with encrypted Wi-Fi and signal isolation capabilities
- Guest privacy protocols exceeding banking industry standards for confidential business discussions
- Crisis management team trained in reputation protection and emergency response

user:
Good afternoon! I'm organizing a networking reception for 75 financial services executives next Thursday evening. We need a private space that projects professional credibility for this Washington crowd. Can your bar accommodate this?

assistant channel=analysis:
Corporate networking for financial executives in DC requiring professional credibility. Check private bar availability for sophisticated setup.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_private_bar_availability:
{"event_date":"next_Thursday","guest_count":75,"duration":"4_hours","setup_type":"networking_stations"}

tool.check_private_bar_availability channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"available_spaces":["executive_lounge_bar","networking_stations_modular"],"capitol_views":"panoramic_available","capacity_confirmed":"75_guests_optimal","setup_options":"flexible_networking_configurations","diplomatic_service":"white_glove_protocol_trained"}

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! Our Executive Lounge Bar with panoramic Capitol views is perfect for 75 financial executives. We offer flexible networking station configurations with white-glove service trained in diplomatic protocol—exactly what Washington's financial community expects. Shall I book the Executive Lounge for next Thursday's 4-hour reception?

user:
Perfect! The Capitol views will definitely impress these executives. Yes, please book the Executive Lounge with your highest level of service.

assistant channel=analysis:
Book executive-level corporate event with premium service and AV capabilities for professional networking.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.book_corporate_event:
{"event_name":"Financial Services Executive Networking","bar_area":"executive_lounge_capitol_views","service_level":"executive","catering_style":"passed_hors_doeuvres","av_requirements":true}

tool.book_corporate_event channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"booking_id":"CORP-EL-2025-556","service_confirmed":"executive_level_diplomatic_protocol","catering":"wolfgang_puck_passed_appetizers","av_setup":"wireless_presentation_live_streaming","security":"former_secret_service_consulting","cost":"$12500_4_hour_package"}

assistant channel=final:
Confirmed! Booking CORP-EL-2025-556 reserves Executive Lounge with Capitol views for your Financial Services Executive Networking. Executive-level service includes diplomatic protocol training, Wolfgang Puck passed appetizers, wireless presentation systems, and former Secret Service security consulting. Total package $12,500 for 4 hours.

user:
Excellent! Your hotel really understands the Washington business community. This level of security and protocol is exactly what we need.

assistant channel=analysis:
Guest appreciates Washington-appropriate service level. Share our government and corporate hospitality heritage.

assistant channel=final:
Thank you! Since 1962, we've specialized in Washington's unique intersection of government and business. Our guest registry includes senators, Supreme Court justices, and Fortune 500 CEOs—we understand the discretion and professionalism this community requires for successful networking.

user:
Could you also provide secure document handling services for any confidential materials shared during the networking?

assistant channel=analysis:
Secure document services go beyond bar event coordination—use attention flag.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Great question about secure document handling. Reviewing our confidential business support services.
